title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
### Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Brew Your Perfect Cup Every Time!**

The Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is designed for those who appreciate a quick and convenient coffee experience. This sleek, compact coffee maker fits perfectly on any countertop and delivers a perfect cup of coffee in under a minute. Whether you're starting your day or enjoying an afternoon break, the K-Compact is your go-to coffee companion.

#### Key Features:

- **Brew Sizes:** Choose from 6, 8, or 10 oz cups to suit your taste.
- **Brew Time:** Get a fresh cup of coffee in under a minute.
- **Water Reservoir:** A 36-ounce removable reservoir makes refilling easy and ensures you can brew multiple cups before needing to refill.
- **Smart Start:** Automatically heats up to the optimal brewing temperature for a perfect cup every time.
- **Button Controls:** Simple and intuitive button controls make it easy to select your preferred brew size.
- **Energy Efficient:** The auto-off feature turns the coffee maker off after 2 hours to save energy and ensure safety.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** The drip tray is removable and can accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall. It also holds a full accidental brew to keep your countertop clean.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Use the hot water function for tea, oatmeal, or instant soups.
- **Compact Design:** With a width of just 8 inches, the K-Compact fits easily into any kitchen space.
- **Compatibility:** Compatible with a wide variety of K-Cup pods, including your favorite coffee, tea, and hot chocolate brands. It also works with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately).

#### Why Choose the Keurig K-Compact?

- **Convenience:** Brew a single cup of coffee, tea, or hot cocoa with the touch of a button.
- **Versatility:** Choose from a wide range of K-Cup pod varieties to suit your mood and taste.
- **Ease of Use:** Simple controls and a compact design make it perfect for any kitchen.
- **Energy Savings:** Auto-off feature helps reduce energy consumption and keeps your home safe.
- **Stylish Design:** The sleek black finish adds a modern touch to your kitchen decor.

#### Specifications:

- **Brew Sizes:** 6, 8, 10 oz
- **Brew Time:** Under a minute
- **Water Reservoir Capacity:** 36 oz
- **Water Reservoir Type:** Removable
- **Smart Start:** Yes
- **Button Controls:** Yes
- **Auto-Off Time:** 2 hours
- **Drip Tray:** Removable, accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, holds full accidental brew
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Yes
- **Width:** 8 inches
- **Compatibility:** K-Cup pods and Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter

Upgrade your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Its compact size, efficient operation, and stylish design make it the perfect addition to any home or office. Order yours today and enjoy a perfect cup of coffee every time!
